 Tightness of real apartness.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
ltd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
letri3d $p |- ( ph -> ( A = B <-> ( A <_ B /\ B <_ A ) ) ) $.
